title: Hobbies and Leisure
sentences: En mi tiempo libre me gusta mucho
In my free time I like to read mystery novels very much.
conmigo en la fiesta de esta noche?
Do you want to dance with me at tonight's party?
My favorite hobby is traveling to different countries every year.
Los fines de semana salgo a
On weekends I go out running through the park.
a los videojuegos solo o con amigos?
Do you prefer playing video games alone or with friends?
Ella saca muchas fotos con su
She takes many photos with her new camera.
para ver el partido de fútbol.
We are going to the stadium to see the soccer match.
en el mar durante el verano.
I love swimming in the sea during the summer.
My sister knows how to paint very beautiful pictures.
Are you coming to the rock concert tonight?
A mi abuelo le gusta hacer
My grandfather likes to do gardening at his house.
música mientras trabajo en la oficina.
I always listen to music while I work in the office.
Do you want to go shopping at the mall on Saturday?
We are going on a trip/hike to the mountain to walk.
I like to cook special dinners for my family.
She practices yoga every morning to relax.
What sport do you usually practice?
para ver las películas de acción.
I like to go to the cinema to see action movies.
We are playing a tennis match in the afternoon.
I have a very old coin collection.
Sometimes we go camping near the lake with friends.
Do you want to meet up with us for a drink?
en mi cuaderno cuando estoy aburrido.
I like to draw in my notebook when I am bored.
It is important to have time to rest and have fun.
